string-array.name: faq_answer
string-array.item: Hisab is an android app which allow its user to maintain their pending transactions with their friends.\n It allow user to send reminder to your friends about pending transaction, in case they forgot it[and even if they are ignoring it ;)]
The Starting screen show list of all pending transactions. If you have not added any it will be blank.

There are many option in navigation menu, like: 
 Pending: For showing all pending transaction, similarly settled for settled transactions. 
 E-Analysis stands for Expense Analysis. It shows a graph of how much you spend on what things. 
 Send Reminder and Sync Pending are explained below.
Shows all Pending transaction.
Shows all Settled transaction.
E-Analysis stands for Expense Analysis. It shows a graph of how much you spend on what things. \n You can also see graph for a particular period of time.
Send Reminder feature allows you to send reminder of pending transaction to your friend.
Sync Pending is for asking your friend to share hi/her transaction details with you.
No. Your transactions are only visible to you. But your friend can ask you to share it using sync pending feature.
No. Neither yoy DP nor your number is visible to anyone.
Just by opening navigation menu(three bar symbol) to see your profile.
By clicking on the existing DP
By clicking edit button
Click on + Symbol on pending screen to add new transactions.
The total amount is divided into all the users equally.
By Swiping right on one particular transaction in detail page, a delete button becomes visible. \n Press that button to delete that transaction.
If yu delete transaction from pending section, it will go in settled section. \n But if you delete transaction from settled section it will get deleted from your mobile.
